verbs.description: [ARG1: A top North Korean official] [V: landed] [ARGM-LOC: in New York] [ARGM-TMP: on Wednesday] [ARGM-PRP: for talks aimed at salvaging a summit between Kim Jong Un and President Donald Trump] .
A top North Korean official landed in New York on Wednesday for talks [V: aimed] [ARG2: at salvaging a summit between Kim Jong Un and President Donald Trump] .
A top North Korean official landed in New York on Wednesday for talks aimed at [V: salvaging] [ARG1: a summit between Kim Jong Un and President Donald Trump] .
